thread.title: ‘Alternative’ Mutual Funds Providing Limited Protection
thread.title_full: ‘Alternative’ Mutual Funds Providing Limited Protection - WSJ

author: Anne Tergesen
title: ‘Alternative’ Mutual Funds Providing Limited Protection
text:
Since the market crash of 2008, more investors have embraced the idea of owning a wide array of investments—from commodities to hedge-fund-like mutual funds to energy partnerships. The goal is to reduce risk and moderate the ups and downs of owning stocks.
But as the U.S. stock market tumbled over the past three months, so-called alternative mutual funds didn’t provided a lot of shelter.
While most categories of funds that are...
